message: I agree with the Gov., the shooters father should have grown a set of balls and participated in his son's upbringing, not discard a troubled kid. What a putz.

Obama cut the military in half. But, for real; president Obama put the next president. Have a job with the military; one thing is there is no U.S. military. The United States have no military force for a WAR. The last 8 years at: #1 was 92,000 troops unemployed. #2 was 65,000 troops unemployed. #3 was 82,000 troops unemployed. That was before the war was over. BUT, THAT WASN'T IT!!! #4 was 65,000 troops unemployed. #5 was 70,000 troops unemployed after the war. That was two years ago in President Obama's second term. If my total number of America military troops unemployed. Is right about now at 371,000 unemployed men and women. YOU CAN TELL ME; ABOUT WHAT THEIR VOTES GOING TO BE.
